What courses are offered?: We offer B.E., B.Tech, M.E., MBA, and MCA programs in various engineering and technology streams.
What is the fee for MCA?: The MCA program costs approximately ₹35,000 to ₹1,20,000 per year.
Is Karpagam College affiliated to Anna U: Yes, Karpagam College of Engineering is affiliated to Anna University, Chennai.
Where is the college located?: Karpagam College of Engineering is located in Myleripalayam, near L&T Bypass Road, Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu, India.
Does the college offer hostel facilities: Yes, hostel facilities are available for both boys and girls with good accommodation and mess facilities.
What is the admission process?: Admissions are based on merit and counseling conducted by Anna University or management quota.
Does the college have placement assistan: Yes, the college has a dedicated placement cell with 90%+ placement record in top companies.
